findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide, which can lead to maintainability and readability issues.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract may not include all required events, which can cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: The contract uses uninitialized local variables, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract does not properly check for zero values in variable setters, which can lead to problems during execution.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful, which can lead to errors.
